00012 int b3ExtractManifoldSequentialGlobal(__global const b3Float4* p, int nPoints, b3Float4ConstArg nearNormal, b3Int4* contactIdx)
00013 {
00014         if( nPoints == 0 )
00015         return 0;
00016     
00017     if (nPoints <=4)
00018         return nPoints;
00019     
00020     
00021     if (nPoints >64)
00022         nPoints = 64;
00023     
00024         b3Float4 center = b3MakeFloat4(0,0,0,0);
00025         {
00026                 
00027                 for (int i=0;i<nPoints;i++)
00028                         center += p[i];
00029                 center /= (float)nPoints;
00030         }
00031     
00032         
00033     
00034         //      sample 4 directions
00035     
00036     b3Float4 aVector = p[0] - center;
00037     b3Float4 u = b3Cross( nearNormal, aVector );
00038     b3Float4 v = b3Cross( nearNormal, u );
00039     u = b3Normalized( u );
00040     v = b3Normalized( v );
00041     
00042     
00043     //keep point with deepest penetration
00044     float minW= FLT_MAX;
00045     
00046     int minIndex=-1;
00047     
00048     b3Float4 maxDots;
00049     maxDots.x = FLT_MIN;
00050     maxDots.y = FLT_MIN;
00051     maxDots.z = FLT_MIN;
00052     maxDots.w = FLT_MIN;
00053     
00054     //  idx, distance
00055     for(int ie = 0; ie<nPoints; ie++ )
00056     {
00057         if (p[ie].w<minW)
00058         {
00059             minW = p[ie].w;
00060             minIndex=ie;
00061         }
00062         float f;
00063         b3Float4 r = p[ie]-center;
00064         f = b3Dot( u, r );
00065         if (f<maxDots.x)
00066         {
00067             maxDots.x = f;
00068             contactIdx[0].x = ie;
00069         }
00070         
00071         f = b3Dot( -u, r );
00072         if (f<maxDots.y)
00073         {
00074             maxDots.y = f;
00075             contactIdx[0].y = ie;
00076         }
00077         
00078         
00079         f = b3Dot( v, r );
00080         if (f<maxDots.z)
00081         {
00082             maxDots.z = f;
00083             contactIdx[0].z = ie;
00084         }
00085         
00086         f = b3Dot( -v, r );
00087         if (f<maxDots.w)
00088         {
00089             maxDots.w = f;
00090             contactIdx[0].w = ie;
00091         }
00092         
00093     }
00094     
00095     if (contactIdx[0].x != minIndex && contactIdx[0].y != minIndex && contactIdx[0].z != minIndex && contactIdx[0].w != minIndex)
00096     {
00097         //replace the first contact with minimum (todo: replace contact with least penetration)
00098         contactIdx[0].x = minIndex;
00099     }
00100     
00101     return 4;
00102     
00103 }

00105 __kernel void   b3NewContactReductionKernel( __global b3Int4* pairs,
00106                                                    __global const b3RigidBodyData_t* rigidBodies,
00107                                                    __global const b3Float4* separatingNormals,
00108                                                    __global const int* hasSeparatingAxis,
00109                                                    __global struct b3Contact4Data* globalContactsOut,

00112                                                    volatile __global int* nGlobalContactsOut,
00113                                                    int vertexFaceCapacity,
00114                                                                                                    int contactCapacity,
00115                                                    int numPairs,
00116                                                                                                    int pairIndex
00117                                                    )
00118 {

00122 
00123     b3Int4 contactIdx;
00124     contactIdx=b3MakeInt4(0,1,2,3);
00125     
00126         if (i<numPairs)
00127         {
00128         
00129                 if (hasSeparatingAxis[i])
00130                 {
00131             
00132                         
00133             
00134             
00135                         int nPoints = clippingFaces[pairIndex].w;
00136            
00137             if (nPoints>0)
00138             {
00139 
00140                  __global b3Float4* pointsIn = &worldVertsB2[pairIndex*vertexFaceCapacity];
00141                 b3Float4 normal = -separatingNormals[i];
00142                 
00143                 int nReducedContacts = b3ExtractManifoldSequentialGlobal(pointsIn, nPoints, normal, &contactIdx);
00144             
00145                 int dstIdx;
00146                 dstIdx = b3AtomicInc( nGlobalContactsOut);
00147                                 
00148 //#if 0
00149                 b3Assert(dstIdx < contactCapacity);
00150                                 if (dstIdx < contactCapacity)
00151                                 {
00152 
00153                                         __global struct b3Contact4Data* c = &globalContactsOut[dstIdx];
00154                                         c->m_worldNormalOnB = -normal;
00155                                         c->m_restituitionCoeffCmp = (0.f*0xffff);c->m_frictionCoeffCmp = (0.7f*0xffff);
00156                                         c->m_batchIdx = pairIndex;
00157                                         int bodyA = pairs[pairIndex].x;
00158                                         int bodyB = pairs[pairIndex].y;
00159 
00160                                         pairs[pairIndex].w = dstIdx;
00161 
00162                                         c->m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyA].m_invMass==0?-bodyA:bodyA;
00163                                         c->m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyB].m_invMass==0?-bodyB:bodyB;
00164                     c->m_childIndexA =-1;
00165                                         c->m_childIndexB =-1;
00166 
00167                     switch (nReducedContacts)
00168                     {
00169                         case 4:
00170                             c->m_worldPosB[3] = pointsIn[contactIdx.w];
00171                         case 3:
00172                             c->m_worldPosB[2] = pointsIn[contactIdx.z];
00173                         case 2:
00174                             c->m_worldPosB[1] = pointsIn[contactIdx.y];
00175                         case 1:
00176                             c->m_worldPosB[0] = pointsIn[contactIdx.x];
00177                         default:
00178                         {
00179                         }
00180                     };
00181                     
00182                                         GET_NPOINTS(*c) = nReducedContacts;
00183                     
00184                  }
00185                  
00186                 
00187 //#endif
00188

00190                 }//             if (hasSeparatingAxis[i])
